channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 06:22 Driven anxiety in the Kherson region.Creck on further messages.
item.description: 游릭 06:22 Driven anxiety in the Kherson region.Creck on further messages.#Kherson_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游릭 06:21 Drive anxiety in the Odesa region. Follow the subsequent messages.
item.description: 游릭 06:21 Drive anxiety in the Odesa region. Follow the subsequent messages.#Odessa_ex This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 06:20 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marhanetsky Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 06:20 Alarm to Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marhanetsky Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community#Dnepropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
